channel.title: Hugo Cactus Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Cactus Theme

item.title: Creating A Round Button With React Native Vector Icons
item.description: I had a design I wanted to replicate and the button in this design is a round button and it has an icon in it. Here is a snapshot I immediately set out to accomplish the task. In my head, it was going to take less than 10 minutes. Ooh was I wrong. It took me the whole day to figure out. I’ll try to make the process be less painful for you and for my future self (I tend to forget alot.

item.title: Initial commit
item.description: This is my first post on this blog. Instead of the legendary “hello world” sentence for doing something for the first time in coding, I’ll call mine “Initial commit” after your first commit in git. Today also signifies the day I was partially let go from my job, not fully. LOL, its complicated, I’ll most likely blog about it later. Anyways, this is the first post on this blog and hopefully more to come.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: To get to me, the quickest way is through Twitter @Mz_Chi Then if you aren’t the kind of person who tweets, you can reach me via email
